title: Create voting website with question and vote tracking

requirements.text: Display the question 'do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?' prominently on a black background screen

quotes: a black screen with two buttons one that says yes and one that says no with a question above "do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?"

acceptanceCriteria: The question text is clearly visible and centered above the buttons
The exact question text matches: 'do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?'

requirements.text: Render two voting buttons labeled 'yes' and 'no' below the question

quotes: two buttons one that says yes and one that says no

acceptanceCriteria: Two buttons are displayed below the question
Buttons are clearly clickable and visually distinct from the black background

requirements.text: Record and persist user votes when either the 'yes' or 'no' button is clicked

quotes: after the user presses yes or no it'll show how many people have pressed that button

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores a count for 'yes' votes
Backend stores a count for 'no' votes
Vote counts persist across canister upgrades
Each button click increments the appropriate counter by one

requirements.text: Display the current vote counts for both 'yes' and 'no' responses after the user votes

quotes: after the user presses yes or no it'll show how many people have pressed that button

acceptanceCriteria: After clicking either button, the vote counts become visible
The count for 'yes' votes is displayed
The count for 'no' votes is displayed
Vote counts update in real-time to reflect the user's vote

requirements.text: Apply a bold, striking visual design with high contrast against the black background that creates an impactful, dramatic aesthetic suitable for a voting question interface
acceptanceCriteria: Visual elements have strong contrast against the black background
Typography and spacing create a dramatic, focused experience
Design feels cohesive and purposeful throughout the interface

nonGoals: Preventing multiple votes from the same user
